question.text:
To: Anthony Lilly [AnthonyLilly@ hotline.com]
From: Customer Service [CS@ComprehensiveAutolns.com]
Date: November 14
Subject: Name Change
Our records show that you ---1--- an automobile policy with us. We pride ourselves on keeping customers up-to-date on company business, so we are writing to ----2-- you that we are changing the name of our company from Comprehensive Auto Insurance to Complete Auto and Life Insurance.
All of our communications will be labeled with the new name beginning next month. You'll find our new name on bills, e-mails, letters, claim forms, and on our Web site. ---3---.
At this time, you may also want to take the opportunity to renew your life insurance ---4--- an appointment, please reply to this e-mail, and you will be contacted by a representative.
Best Regards,
Customer Service
Comprehensive Auto Insurance.

answer.explanation: Use simple past tense
Based on the meaning of words.

choices: (A) They have been sent to the name provided on the form.
(B) We will mail them to your residence on a monthly basis.
(C) They must be submitted in person to one of our staff.
(D) We will modify our name on our policy documents as well.

answer.text: (D) We will modify our name on our policy documents as well.
answer.explanation: Based on the previous  sentence " You'll find our new name on bills, e-mails, letters, claim forms, and on our web site."
By phare "to make an appointment"

question.text:
ATTENTION ALL TENANTS
Wimberley Group will ---1--- its rent collection system to electronic one. This change will apply to all apartments effective February 1. ---2---. Cash and personal checks will no longer be accepted.
Every tenant needs to create a user profile at www.wimberlygroup.com. After logging in, tenants will be able to ---3--- a payment. You can do this by selecting the unpaid bill and then clicking on the button at the bottom of the screen. ---4--- you hit “Pay”, the amount you designate will be deducted from your registered credit card or bank account. If you wish to arrange automatic payments, please click the button labeled “Pay this amount every month.”
Thank you for your cooperation. If you have any questions, e-mail US at help@wimberlygroup.com
Wimberley Group will ---1--- its rent collection system to electronic one.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text: This change will apply to all apartments effective February 1. ---2---.
choices: (A) Tenants had found the new system easy to use.
(B) From that day on, tenants must pay their rental fees online.
(C) The new system allowed for a greater variety of payment options.
(D) Only certain Wimberley Group occupants will be affected.

answer.text: (B) From that day on, tenants must pay their rental fees online.
answer.explanation: The previous sentence mentions a day when the change will apply to all apartments => B is correct

question.text: After logging in, tenants will be able to ---3--- a payment. You can do this by selecting the unpaid bill and then clicking on the button at the bottom of the screen.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text: ---4--- you hit “Pay”, the amount you designate will be deducted from your registered credit card or bank account.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of conjunctions

question.text:
To: Angela Thornberry [athornberry@fastmail.com]
From: Vincent Nakamura [vnakamura@traxcomputers.com]
Subject: Your laptop
Date: June 18
Dear Ms. Thornberry,
I am writing about the Trax 2700 laptop you dropped off at our store on June 15 because of problems with its screen. After sending it to our ---1---for examination, we discovered that it contained a faulty component. At present, your laptop is being ---2---. As requested, we are also thoroughly testing the device to see if there are any other issues.
As this problem appears to have been entirely our fault, we will provide you with a $50 voucher to use at our retail store. ---3---, e-coupons for our Web site are also available. Just let us know which you'd prefer.
---4---. If you have not received it by then, please call customer service.
Best wishes,
Vincent Nakamura
Customer Satisfaction Department
After sending it to our ---1---for examination, we discovered that it contained a faulty component.

answer.explanation: send something to somebody => choose C

question.text: At present, your laptop is being ---2---.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of verbs

question.text: As this problem appears to have been entirely our fault, we will provide you with a $50 voucher to use at our retail store. ---3---, e-coupons for our Web site are also available.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of adverbs

question.text: ---4---. If you have not received it by then, please call customer service.
choices: (A) The model you inquired about is no longer available at this location.
(B) We will send the computer back to you within three days.
(C) You are not covered under the warranty as it has expired.
(D) We have been receiving a number of complaints about our service.

answer.text: (B) We will send the computer back to you within three days.
answer.explanation: The following sentence mentions "If you have not received it by then" => B is correct

question.text:
Notice for All Staff
The shopping mall our store is located in will be closed from December 24 to 26. ---1---, some of you will be coming in on December 24 to set up for our post-holiday sale. The guard who usually opens the mall doors in the morning is off duty during this time. ---2---. Daniel Monahan is the most senior staff member, so I will give it to him, and he will let everyone inside.
It is vital that you ---3--- Daniel at the entrance at exactly 10 a.m. We don't want to waste time making him go back and forth to open the doors, so please be considerate and arrive as ---4---
The shopping mall our store is located in will be closed from December 24 to 26. ---1---, some of you will be coming in on December 24 to set up for our post-holiday sale.

answer.explanation: The previous sentence indicates that the shopping mall our store is located in will be closed from December 24 to 26 while this sentence says ome of you will be coming in on December 24... => "However" is correct

question.text: The guard who usually opens the mall doors in the morning is off duty during this time. ---2---.
choices: (A) Making sure we answer customer inquiries in a timely manner is our priority.
(B) You should be able to use your employee pass to access the mall.
(C) A security code will therefore be required to enter the building.
(D) You will need to handle backorders caused by his absence.

answer.text: (C) A security code will therefore be required to enter the building.
answer.explanation: It's mentioned that the guard who usually opens the mall doors in the morning is off duty so a security code will therefore be required to enter the building.

question.text: It is vital that you ---3--- Daniel at the entrance at exactly 10 a.m.

answer.explanation: It is + adjective + S + V-infinitive

question.text: We don't want to waste time making him go back and forth to open the doors, so please be considerate and arrive as ---4---

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text:
To: Rajesh Singh [rajesh.singh@indiaclothing.in]
From: Faria Deveraj [f.deveraj@mumbai.gov.in]
Subject:Scheduled Inspection
Date: October 12
Dear Mr. Singh,
On October 17, your clothing factory will face its yearly government inspection. This annual ---1--- will verify that all labor laws are being followed. Your factory passed the ---2--- evaluation with no major problems, so our inspectors hope to see a similar level of compliance this time around.
You are ---3--- obliged to provide access to any part of the factory that the inspectors may wish to see. Failure to comply in this regard may result in fines and further investigation. Also, the inspectors need to confirm that workers are being properly compensated. ---4---.
Thank you for your attention to this matter.
Faria Deveraj
Inspection Team Leader
City Government of Mumbai
This annual ---1--- will verify that all labor laws are being followed.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text: Your factory passed the ---2--- evaluation with no major problems, so our inspectors hope to see a similar level of compliance this time around.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text: You are ---3--- obliged to provide access to any part of the factory that the inspectors may wish to see. Failure to comply in this regard may result in fines and further investigation.

answer.explanation: The blank is between "is" and "obliged" => use adverb

question.text: Also, the inspectors need to confirm that workers are being properly compensated. ---4---.
choices: (A) A copy of the receipt for your recent payment has been sent to you in the mail
(B) The human resources department will need to prepare the relevant documents.
(C) Consequently, the company wishes to avoid paying any such penalties.
(D) We are interested in hearing about certain products that were recalled.

answer.text: (B) The human resources department will need to prepare the relevant documents.
answer.explanation: B makes most sense among the answers. The relevant documents for the compensation.

question.text: Pro Unis is now hiring for positions in our production, human resources, and accounting departments. As one of the region's largest employers, Pro Unis—-1.— workforces with uniforms for over 70 years. Since our founding, Pro Unis has been committed to employee retention and—-2.—. We offer competitive wages, job training, and regular opportunities for promotion. To learn more about—-3.— , visit prounis.com/careers. Interested job- seekers will be directed to fill out an online application and upload a resume.-— 4.—.

answer.explanation:
Sign: "For over 70 years"
=> The Present Perfect Tense

Parallel structure

- Retention and ...         

- Noun "and" = -> noun 
=>  Answer: advancement
Based on the meaning of the word to choose the correct answer.

choices: (A)They must also pass a background check to be eligible for employment.
(B)Let Pro Unis design work uniforms for your company.
(C)You can now follow us on social media.
(D)We recently hired a new director of human resources.

answer.text: (A)They must also pass a background check to be eligible for employment.
answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of the word to choose the correct answer.

question.text:

ws Dental provides a full range of dental services at both offices. They are both open from 8 A.M. to 5 P.M., Monday through Friday. —-4.—. Extended evening hours will be considered in the coming season.

question.text:
To: HYPERLINK "mailto.jroux@xmail.com

Date: March 2

Dear Ms. Roux,

question.text:
Hurst Airlines Improves its Customer Service Offerings
LOS ANGELES (September 22) - Hurst Airlines has started installing self-check-in kiosks where passengers can scan their identification, print their own boarding passes, and tag their own luggage to be loaded onto the aircraft. These new -1.-- are already in place at two airports in California.— 2.-— will soon be available at all airports where Hurst Airlines flies. According to Hurst Airlines CEO Roxana Ghazi, the company aims for all its service areas —3.— equipped with kiosks by the end of the summer.
The intent of these kiosks is to make the check-in process run more quickly. Said Ms. Ghazi, "We have limited staff, and lines can often be quite long.— 4.—. These new kiosks are expected to significantly reduce the amount of time spent in line."

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of the word to choose the correct answer

Use the previous sentence to judge what the subject being repeated
- Devices (in the previous sentence) - plural noun
- The answer is they

To be equipped with ...
=> use passive voice

choices: (B)Passengers should arrive two hours before a flight.
(C)We expect to hire more staff soon.
(D)This is especially true during peak operating times.

answer.text: (D)This is especially true during peak operating times.
answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of the sentence to choose the correct answer.

question.text:
